text: King John is a play by William Shakespeare. It is a history play about King John of England. Shakespeare's source was Holinshed's Chronicles. It was probably first acted between 1596 and 1597. It was probably first printed in 1623 in the First Folio.King John ==References== Category:Plays by William Shakespeare Category:Plays based on English history Category:1590s plays
title: King John (play)
